sentences.sContent: The perfume of this passionate plant may turn a maiden's head, hence wild honeysuckle is a symbol of inconstancy in love.
sentences.sContent_eng: The perfume of this passionate plant may turn a maiden's head, hence wild honeysuckle is a symbol of inconstancy in love.
sentences.sCn: 充满激情的忍冬所散发的香气令少女却步回首，因此野生忍冬象征着爱情的反复无常。

remMethod.val: in(不) + constancy(恒久不变) → 反复无常

words.tran: 变化无常的；易变的；多变的
